author: jason-entenmann
title: figure caption code issues -- space after end of caption is breaking code
description:
It looks like the markdown to PDF conversion didn't properly format the figure descriptions (some did, some didn't). I am assuming this is suppose to be bold, and we should not have the asteriks, that should have been markdown code.

After looking into it more, looks like I found the issue. 

There is a space after the figure caption and before '</figcaption>**' code, which looks like it breaks the operation. 
https://github.com/pluralitybook/plurality/blob/941a8594a24df946c2e3e2c9174cfb291c6e36a3/contents/english/2-0-information-technology-and-democracy-a-widening-gulf.md?plain=1#L69C92-L69C94

Example with no space, code does not break in: https://github.com/pluralitybook/plurality/blob/941a8594a24df946c2e3e2c9174cfb291c6e36a3/contents/english/6-0-from-%E2%BF%BB-to-reality.md?plain=1#L78
